page.title: 03Family Life
page.content: In my family I have my mummy ,daddy and two brothers, Andrew who is 12 and Jeffrey who is 10. One Grandpa lives 200 miles away and my other Grandpa and Grandma live 9 miles away. I go horse riding and so does Jeffrey. Andrew, Jeffrey, mummy and I go to watch daddy play cricket. Andrew and Jeffrey play football for Rhodes Youth Club. I go to ballet and modern dancing. Mummy plays badminton. I go to swimming lessons and after I sometimes play badminton. I have a piano at home,Andrew and I are very keen on the piano. I have two cats,their names are Button and Pepper. Button sleeps in my bed with me and Pepper sleeps with Andrew. My mum and dad both work. My dad is a headmaster in a Comprehensive School in London. My mum teaches in an Infant School in Dunmow.
